meanings.definition: relating to the vestibule of the ear
meanings.sent1: The vestibular system helps us keep our balance.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her vestibular function to assess her balance.
meanings.sent3: The cat's vestibular sense was so sharp, it could walk along the narrow ledge effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her vestibular perception was like a finely tuned instrument, never letting her trip or stumble.
meanings.sent5: The vestibular sensation of spinning made her dizzy and disoriented.

meanings.definition: relating to the vestibule of the inner ear
meanings.sent1: The vestibular organs in the inner ear help us maintain equilibrium.
meanings.sent2: The vestibular nerve carries signals from the inner ear to the brain.
meanings.sent3: The vestibular labyrinth in the inner ear is crucial for our sense of balance.
meanings.sent4: His vestibular system in the inner ear was so sensitive, he could detect even the slightest movement.
meanings.sent5: The vestibular sensation in the inner ear made him feel like he was spinning in circles.

meanings.definition: relating to the vestibule of the nose
meanings.sent1: The vestibular region of the nose is responsible for detecting odors.
meanings.sent2: The vestibular nerve in the nose transmits signals to the brain about smell.
meanings.sent3: Her vestibular sense in the nose was so acute, she could identify scents from far away.
meanings.sent4: The vestibular receptors in the nose acted like tiny sensors, picking up on different smells.
meanings.sent5: The vestibular perception in the nose made her appreciate the fragrant flowers even more.
